Who is Stokes Qu?

An optimistic nihilist with strong aptitude for mathematics and insane enthusiasm about Artificial Intelligence & Statistics.
He has lived in Asia, Africa and Europe.
He has participated in 57th IMO, got the right answers for 4/6 questions, but missed the medal because of informal writing :(
He has this wild dream of creating a super-intelligence with the potential to discover the truth of the universe.

What is Mr.Q's Hub?

A collection of my side hustle efforts.
You can find my CV and self-study notes (and maybe my two cents about life philosophy) here.
My self-study is mainly about AI & Statistics, but there will be other topics as well.
All contents are created and owned by me. Do NOT copy my articles without my permission.
Have fun.
